dreisoft.tresos.generator.api.generator

Interface ICodeGenerator2

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ICodeGenerator

    public interface ICodeGenerator2
extends ICodeGenerator
    This is the interface that a code generator must implement. ICodeGenerator2 is an extension of ICodeGenerator about a verification interface.
    Since:
    12.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      Generator Mode: Generate Code

    • Method Detail

      • verifySystemModel

        void verifySystemModel(CodeGeneratorContext context,
                       APIOperationStatus status)
        Calls the verification mechanism for the system model of the CodeGenerator. You can use a standard AutosarVerififier which verifies that all mandatory elements are available or you implement your own custom verifier which checks all your requirements to the system model.
        Note that you should only check the elements your generator really needs because the system model is possibly not complete because of partially imports (e.g. the dbc file import does never import all elements, references and attributes required by Autosar).
        If verification fails (an error-status is added), the generator will not be called!
        Example to use the Standard Autosar 3.x Verifier
        class MyCodeGenerator implements ICodeGenerator2{
        public void verifySystemModel( CodeGeneratorContext context, APIOperationStatus status ){
        ...
        IVerifier verifier = dreisoft.tresos.tresosdb.api.model.v1.verifier.AutosarVerifier31_6.INSTANCE;
        myEntity.verify( verifier, true, status );
        }
        }

        Example to create a Custom Autosar 3.x Verifier
        class MyCusomVerifier extends dreisoft.tresos.tresosdb.api.model.v1.verifier.AutosarVerifier31_6{
        public void verifyPPortPrototype( IPPortPrototype pPortPrototype, APIOperationStatus status ){
        // Perform the things you need to verify
        }
        public void verifyRPortPrototype( IRPortPrototype rPortPrototype, APIOperationStatus status ){
        // Perform the things you need to verify
        }
        //More of your verifications
        }

        class MyCodeGenerator implements ICodeGenerator2{
        public void verifySystemModel( CodeGeneratorContext context, APIOperationStatus status ){
        ...
        IVerifier verifier = new MyCusomVerifier();
        pPort.verify( verifier, true, status );
        }
        }
        Parameters:
        context - parameters for the generator run
        status - APIOperationStatus for error and other status messages
        Since:
        12.0
